name: turboCleaningMode_setValue
description: This function is used to activate the turbo cleaning mode on a SmartThings device.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to activate the turbo cleaning mode.

parameters.name: predefinedTurboCleaningMode
parameters.description: The predefined turbo cleaning mode to activate.
